meta.name: Aurora Dashboard - Design System
meta.author: creative-director-ai
meta.description: High-level design guidelines and component tokens to replicate the dark, glassy, neon-accent dashboard aesthetic shown in the provided screenshots. Intended to instruct an AI or engineering team to reproduce the look consistently.

designPrinciples: Depth through soft layered shadows and subtle inner-glow — create a tactile surface hierarchy.
Dark, desaturated base with vibrant accents — let color accents carry emphasis and affordance.
Glassmorphism + neumorphism hybrid — translucent surfaces, blurred backplates with clear outlines.
Micro-contrast for content separation — use thin borders and subtle gradients instead of hard separations.
Readable typography at all sizes — large expressive display; compact body text with high legibility.
System-first tokens — everything driven by named tokens (colors, spacing, radii, elevations).

typography.primaryFont: Neue Montreal, system-ui, -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial

usage.page-titles: display-1 semibold, large negative tracking for logo-like treatment

appShell.description: Full-bleed dark canvas with left vertical navigation, top utility bar and central content area using cards and columns.

sidebar.treatment: deep-left rounded outer shadow + inner highlight on active icon

visualLanguage.shadows: Use deep, soft drop shadows on the outer frame and subtle inner highlights for inset glass surfaces. Card shadows should be darker and more diffuse near edges.
visualLanguage.borders: Thin (1px) semi-opaque borders to separate panels; slightly lighter outlines for interactive controls.
visualLanguage.glowAndAccent: Accent actions use neon-like glows at low opacity. Hover states increase glow and slightly lift the element using elevation tokens.
visualLanguage.gradients: Micro-gradients for buttons and progress fills, mostly linear with a gentle angle (10–20deg).
visualLanguage.texture: Flat with depth via shadow/blur — avoid noise textures. Use very subtle vignette toward corners to focus center content.

interactions.click: quick depress (translateY 1-2px) + brief ripple for primary actions
interactions.focus: soft 4px offset glow using accent color at 8% opacity

accessibility.contrastGuidelines: Ensure primary text (text-primary) on surface backgrounds meet at least 4.5:1 contrast. Use bolder weights for smaller sizes if needed.
accessibility.keyboard: All interactive elements must have clear focus indicators and logical tab order.
accessibility.motionPrefs: Respect reduce-motion. Replace parallax or heavy transitions with subtle opacity-only changes when user requests reduced motion.

usageExamples.dashboardLayout: Left fixed 72px sidebar. Topbar 64px. Main content split into a 2/3 column (cards + table) and a 1/3 column (side cards). Cards stacked with 16px spacing.
usageExamples.taskCard: compact card with title, 2-line meta, actions on the right, primary mint CTA bottom-left. Progress bar under title with fill gradient.
usageExamples.projectRow: avatar stack left, project name, assignee, date, updates. Hover: row lifts 1px and faint accent glow on the left edge.
